rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 12 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:34 PM, 20 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga and Zambales within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(Zaragoza, Aliaga, Quezon, Licab, San Antonio, Jaen), Tarlac(La Paz) and Quezon(San Francisco, San Andres, San Narciso) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
